metadata.title: CVE-2017-2295 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of Puppet prior to 4.10.1 will deserialize data off the wire (fromthe agent to the server, in this case) with a attacker-specified format.This could be used to force YAML deserialization in an unsafe manner, whichwould lead to remote code execution. This change constrains the format ofdata on the wire to PSON or safely decoded YAML.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
